content: Extensions and Profiles are meant to have FMM levels. They haven't until now.
I am assigning them all default FMM levels of 1 right now.
you can change the level for extension by filling out a number in the "FMM" column for extensions.
and by putting metadata fmm-[tabname] in the metadata of a profile
sory about this - it emerged as an issue when I was doing QA
